name: chronometric-age
title: Chronometric Age
description: An approximation of temporal position (in the sense conveyed by https://www.w3.org/TR/owl-time/#time:TemporalPosition) that is supported by evidence.
comments: The age of a dwc:MaterialEntity and how this age is known, whether by a dating assay, a relative association with dated material, or legacy collections information.
examples: `An age range associated with a specimen derived from an AMS dating assay applied to an oyster shell in the same stratum`; `An age range associated with a specimen derived from a ceramics analysis based on other materials found in the same stratum`; `A maximum age associated with a specimen derived from K-Ar dating applied to a proximal volcanic tuff found stratigraphically below the specimen`; `An age range of a specimen based on its biostratigraphic context`; `An age of a specimen based on what is reported in legacy collections data.`
rdfs:comment: An approximation of temporal position (in the sense conveyed by https://www.w3.org/TR/owl-time/#time:TemporalPosition) that is supported by evidence.

fields.name: chronometricAgeID
fields.title: Chronometric Age ID
fields.description: An identifier for a chrono:ChronometricAge.
fields.comments: Recommended best practice is to use a globally unique identifier.
fields.rdfs:comment: An identifier for the set of information associated with a chrono:ChronometricAge.

fields.name: eventID
fields.title: Event ID
fields.description: An identifier for a dwc:Event.
fields.comments: Recommended best practice is to use a globally unique identifier.
fields.rdfs:comment: An identifier for the set of information associated with a dwc:Event (something that occurs at a place and time). May be a global unique identifier or an identifier specific to the data set.

fields.name: verbatimChronometricAge
fields.title: Verbatim Chronometric Age
fields.description: A verbatim age for a dwc:Event, whether reported by a dating assay, associated references, or legacy information.
fields.comments: For example, this could be the radiocarbon age as given in an AMS dating report. This could also be simply what is reported as the age of a specimen in legacy collections data.
fields.rdfs:comment: The verbatim age for a specimen, whether reported by a dating assay, associated references, or legacy information.

fields.name: chronometricAgeProtocol
fields.title: Chronometric Age Protocol
fields.description: A description of or reference to a dwc:Protocol used to determine a chrono:ChronometricAge.
fields.rdfs:comment: A description of or reference to the methods used to determine the chrono:ChronometricAge.

fields.name: chronometricAgeProtocolID
fields.title: Chronometric Age Protocol ID
fields.description: An identifier for a dwc:Protocol used to determine a chrono:ChronometricAge.
fields.comments: Recommended best practice is to use a globally unique identifier.

fields.name: uncalibratedChronometricAge
fields.title: Uncalibrated Chronometric Age
fields.description: An output of a dating assay before it is calibrated into an age using a specific conversion protocol.
fields.rdfs:comment: The output of a dating assay before it is calibrated into an age using a specific conversion protocol.

fields.name: chronometricAgeConversionProtocol
fields.title: Chronometric Age Conversion Protocol
fields.description: A description of or reference to a dwc:Protocol used to convert a chrono:uncalibratedChronometricAge into a chronometric age in years, as captured in the chrono:earliestChronometricAge, chrono:earliestChronometricAgeReferenceSystem, chrono:latestChronometricAge, and chrono:latestChronometricAgeReferenceSystem fields.
fields.comments: For example, calibration of conventional radiocarbon age or the currently accepted age range of a cultural or geological period.
fields.rdfs:comment: The method used for converting the chrono:uncalibratedChronometricAge into a chronometric age in years, as captured in the chrono:earliestChronometricAge, chrono:earliestChronometricAgeReferenceSystem, chrono:latestChronometricAge, and chrono:latestChronometricAgeReferenceSystem fields.

fields.name: chronometricAgeConversionProtocolID
fields.title: Chronometric Age Conversion Protocol ID
fields.description: An identifier for a dwc:Protocol used to convert a chrono:uncalibratedChronometricAge into a chronometric age in years, as captured in the chrono:earliestChronometricAge, chrono:earliestChronometricAgeReferenceSystem, chrono:latestChronometricAge, and chrono:latestChronometricAgeReferenceSystem fields.
fields.comments: Recommended best practice is to use a globally unique identifier.

fields.name: earliestChronometricAge
fields.title: Earliest Chronometric Age
fields.description: A maximum/earliest/oldest possible age of a dwc:MaterialEntity as determined by a dating method.
fields.comments: The expected unit for this field is years. This field, if populated, must have an associated chrono:earliestChronometricAgeReferenceSystem.
fields.rdfs:comment: The maximum/earliest/oldest possible age of a specimen as determined by a dating method.

fields.name: earliestChronometricAgeReferenceSystem
fields.title: Earliest Chronometric Age Reference System
fields.description: A reference system associated with a chrono:earliestChronometricAge.
fields.comments: Recommended best practice is to use a controlled vocabulary.
fields.rdfs:comment: The reference system associated with the chrono:earliestChronometricAge.

fields.name: latestChronometricAge
fields.title: Latest Chronometric Age
fields.description: A minimum/latest/youngest possible age of a dwc:MaterialEntity as determined by a dating method.
fields.comments: The expected unit for this field is years. This field, if populated, must have an associated latestChronometricAgeReferenceSystem.
fields.rdfs:comment: The minimum/latest/youngest possible age of a specimen as determined by a dating method.

fields.name: latestChronometricAgeReferenceSystem
fields.title: Latest Chronometric Age Reference System
fields.description: A reference system associated with a chrono:latestChronometricAge.
fields.comments: Recommended best practice is to use a controlled vocabulary.
fields.rdfs:comment: The reference system associated with the chrono:latestChronometricAge.

fields.name: chronometricAgeUncertaintyInYears
fields.title: Chronometric Age Uncertainty In Years
fields.description: A temporal uncertainty of a chrono:earliestChronometricAge and chrono:latestChronometricAge in years.
fields.comments: The expected unit for this field is years. The value in this field is number of years before and after the values given in the earliest and latest chronometric age fields within which the actual values are estimated to be.
fields.rdfs:comment: The temporal uncertainty of the chrono:earliestChronometricAge and chrono:latestChronometricAge in years.

fields.name: chronometricAgeUncertaintyMethod
fields.title: Chronometric Age Uncertainty Method
fields.description: A method used to generate a value of chrono:ChronometricAgeUncertaintyInYears.
fields.rdfs:comment: The method used to generate the value of chrono:chronometricAgeUncertaintyInYears.

fields.name: materialDated
fields.title: Material Dated
fields.description: A description of a dwc:MaterialEntity on which a chrono:ChronometricAgeProtocol was actually performed, if known.
fields.comments: Recommended best practice is to use a globally unique identifier.
fields.rdfs:comment: A description of the material on which the chrono:chronometricAgeProtocol was actually performed, if known.

fields.name: materialDatedID
fields.title: Material Dated ID
fields.description: An identifier for a dwc:MaterialEntity on which a chrono:ChronometricAgeProtocol was performed, if applicable.
fields.comments: Recommended best practice is to use a globally unique identifier.
fields.rdfs:comment: An identifier for the dwc:MaterialEntity on which the chrono:chronometricAgeProtocol was performed, if applicable.

fields.name: materialDatedRelationship
fields.title: Material Dated Relationship
fields.description: A relationship of a chrono:materialDated to a dwc:MaterialEntity, from which a chrono:ChronometricAge of the related dwc:MaterialEntity and any related dwc:Occurrence is inferred.
fields.comments: Recommended best practice is to use a controlled vocabulary.
fields.rdfs:comment: The relationship of the chrono:materialDated to the subject of the chrono:ChronometricAge record, from which the chrono:ChronometricAge of the subject is inferred.

fields.name: chronometricAgeDeterminedBy
fields.title: Chronometric Age Determined By
fields.description: A list (concatenated and separated) of names of dcterms:Agents responsible for determining the chrono:ChronometricAge.
fields.comments: Recommended best practice is to separate the values in a list with space vertical bar space (` | `).
fields.rdfs:comment: A list (concatenated and separated) of names of people, groups, or organizations who determined the chrono:ChronometricAge.

fields.name: chronometricAgeDeterminedByID
fields.title: Chronometric Age Determined By ID
fields.description: An identifier for a dcterms:Agent responsible for determining a chrono:ChronometricAge.
fields.comments: Recommended best practice is to provide a single identifier that disambiguates the details of the acting dcterms:Agent. If a list is used, the order of the agents on the list should not be assumed to convey any semantics. Recommended best practice is to separate the values in a list with space vertical bar space (` | `).

fields.name: chronometricAgeDeterminedDate
fields.title: Chronometric Age Determined Date
fields.description: A date on which a chrono:ChronometricAge was determined.
fields.comments: Recommended best practice is to use a date that conforms to ISO 8601-1:2019.
fields.rdfs:comment: The date on which the chrono:ChronometricAge was determined.

fields.name: chronometricAgeReferences
fields.title: Chronometric Age References
fields.description: A list (concatenated and separated) of dcterms:BibliographicResources associated with a chrono:ChronometricAge.
fields.comments: Recommended best practice is to separate the values in a list with space vertical bar space (` | `).
fields.rdfs:comment: A list (concatenated and separated) of identifiers (publication, bibliographic reference, global unique identifier, URI) of literature associated with the chrono:ChronometricAge.

fields.name: chronometricAgeRemarks
fields.title: Chronometric Age Remarks
fields.description: Comments or notes about a chrono:ChronometricAge.
fields.rdfs:comment: Notes or comments about the chrono:ChronometricAge.
